issues.description: The helper method singFarmSongVerse in Farm.java is declared without the required Animal parameter, but the problem specification and solution expect a signature singFarmSongVerse(Animal animal). Students will be unable to implement or invoke the verse method correctly since the parameter is missing.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the method signature in Farm.java to include the Animal parameter: public void singFarmSongVerse(Animal animal)

issues.description: The problem text instructs that singFarmSongVerse should be public for testing, but both the template and reference solution declare it as private. This visibility mismatch will prevent tests or external calls and contradicts the specification.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the visibility of singFarmSongVerse in Farm.java to public to match the specification and support testing
